name: Flappy Team Adventure
description:
Guide your Flappy Hero through the levels to gather coins and to get your all time best score! Use the coins to unlock fellow heroes and then choose which one to use to best your score.

- 50 different scenes to challenge your skill.

- 4 additional heroes to unlock.

- Travel into caves, but watch out for the creatures that live there.

- Hours of fun

- Lots of different enemies to avoid

- Fun pop soundtrack.
